physical_object.name: office chair with black mesh back, black seat cushion, and armrests

assignments.utilization_method: Stand beside the chair and use the broad mesh backrest as the drawing area, sweeping the pen across the slightly springy mesh for smooth resistance.

physical_object.name: yellow snack bag of Japanese pea crackers

assignments.utilization_method: Pinch the sealed top edge with thumb and index finger, cradle the body of the bag in the remaining fingers, and squeeze the contents toward the bottom
Grasp the right-hand grip of the controller and repeatedly squeeze the right trigger with the index finger

physical_object.name: transparent plastic umbrella with white curved handle

assignments.utilization_method: Hold the curved handle firmly, keep the canopy closed, and swing the ferrule tip downward as the striking point
Clasp the top knob between thumb and forefinger, allowing the cylindrical body to extend downward as the chisel shaft

physical_object.name: metallic ballpoint pen with a clear barrel

assignments.utilization_method: Hold the pen in a standard tripod grip and glide its tip across a surface exactly as you would move a paint brush

physical_object.name: Apple iMac desktop computer with silver aluminum stand

assignments.utilization_method: Press the controller tip against the front edge of the solid aluminum stand while it remains stationary on the desk

physical_object.name: empty wine glass with long stem

assignments.utilization_method: Pinch the stem near the base, set the flat circular base on the table, and slide the base smoothly across the surface in straight strokes
